Subject: Rope Basics: The Bedroom & Beyond
Description: This is a hands-on rope workshop that will quickly teach basic rope skills for the bedroom. Learn safe ways to tie someone to a bed or restrict their movement. A limited amount of rope will be available for loan.  Speakers include:kernelbrandon - Track: After Dark  - Duration: 1 hour and 30 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Rope for Decoration and Restraint
Description: Learn the ins and outs of a few basic harnesses and how to integrate more decorative knotwork into your rope ties. There will be some discussion of flow in a rope scene. A limited amount of rope will be available for loan.  Speakers include:kernelbrandon - Track: After Dark  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
